title: G80 Demo
description:
How can we stay warm when we're working out in our garage or shop?
In this video we look over the features of the G80 garage heater from Newair.

This heater has received a lot of great reviews. It’s designed to be mounted on the ceiling, which is the best place get the most even distribution, and the most efficiency, It keeps it out of the way, and one reviewer pointed out that they feel much safer with it being out of reach of children and pets. It comes with the mounting bracket, and everything you need to install it. 

It has to be hard-wired, but it’s still pretty easy to set up. Please check out the reviews on the web page for tips on setting it up, or give us a call, we’re always happy to help. 

It uses fan-forced heating to move the air, so it heats up the room faster. And it tuns out an amazing 17,000 BTU’s of heat, which is enough to warm up a space of about 500 square feet. It has certified overheat protection that will automatically shut off it it senses that it’s getting warmer than it should. And theres a safety mesh to keep objects from getting inside. It also has a switch to turn the heater off, and just use the fan if you want to circulate the air.

See the video to learn all about the G80 space heater from Newair.

transcripts: Hi I'm Emily and today we'll be taking a look at the G80 Garage heater from NewAir. This heater has received great reviews customers are so surprised how powerful it is for its small size and that it can heat up so quickly. It is designed to be mounted on the ceiling which is the best place to get the most even distribution and the most efficiency. See it keeps it out of the way and one reviewer pointed out that they feel much safer with it being out of reach of children and pets. It comes with a mounting bracket and everything you need to set it up, it has to be hardwired but one reviewer says that the setup was pretty easy. It uses fan-forced heating to move the air being able to heat up a room much faster and with 17,000 BTUs of heat its able to heat up a room of about 500 square feet. It has certified overheat protection so its senses when it's getting warmer than it should and it has a safety mesh keeping objects from getting inside and it has a switch so you can turn the heat off and just use the fan to circulate the air. Thank you for taking a look with me today at the G80 garage heater from NewAir. At NewAir where trust is important to us we test each product line before we put it on the market to make sure it's reliable we have a world-class dependable dedicated customer service team so your calls and emails go to real people and we've been doing this since 2002 so we've built a reputation as one of the best customer review companies online. That's why new air is a name you can trust.
